sn46.7:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kutagarassa ya kaci gopanasiyo, sabba ta kutaninna kutapona kutapabbhara;
sn46.7:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn46.7:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn46.7:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …pe…
sn46.7:2.3: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn46.7:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
